methods.name: public Builder setMediaId(@Nullable String mediaId)
methods.comment:
* Sets the media id.
         *
         * @param mediaId The unique id for the item or null.
         * @return this

methods.name: public Builder setTitle(@Nullable CharSequence title)
methods.comment:
* Sets the title.
         *
         * @param title A title suitable for display to the user or null.
         * @return this

methods.name: public Builder setSubtitle(@Nullable CharSequence subtitle)
methods.comment:
* Sets the subtitle.
         *
         * @param subtitle A subtitle suitable for display to the user or null.
         * @return this

methods.name: public Builder setDescription(@Nullable CharSequence description)
methods.comment:
* Sets the description.
         *
         * @param description A description suitable for display to the user or
         *            null.
         * @return this

methods.name: public Builder setIconBitmap(@Nullable Bitmap icon)
methods.comment:
* Sets the icon.
         *
         * @param icon A {@link Bitmap} icon suitable for display to the user or
         *            null.
         * @return this

methods.name: public Builder setIconUri(@Nullable Uri iconUri)
methods.comment:
* Sets the icon uri.
         *
         * @param iconUri A {@link Uri} for an icon suitable for display to the
         *            user or null.
         * @return this

methods.name: public Builder setExtras(@Nullable Bundle extras)
methods.comment:
* Sets a bundle of extras.
         *
         * @param extras The extras to include with this description or null.
         * @return this

methods.name: public Builder setMediaUri(@Nullable Uri mediaUri)
methods.comment:
* Sets the media uri.
         *
         * @param mediaUri The content's {@link Uri} for the item or null.
         * @return this

methods.name: public MediaDescription build()
methods.comment:
* Build {@link MediaDescription}.
         *
         * @return a new media description.
